description: [Reuters - UK Focus] - Morgan Stanley, Barclays Plc and Royal Bank of Canada took the top spots advising Canadian mergers and acquisitions in 2016 as deals in the pipeline, power and utility sectors propelled deal volume to ...
title: Morgan Stanley, Barclays top Canadian M&A adviser rankings in 2016

description: [Reuters] - NEW YORK/TORONTO, Jan 5 (Reuters) - Morgan Stanley, Barclays Plc and Royal Bank of Canada took the top spots advising Canadian mergers and acquisitions in 2016 as deals in the pipeline, power and utility sectors propelled deal volume to a nine-year high. Deal value climbed 8.3 percent to $250.7 billion last year, from 2015 levels, according to data released by Thomson Reuters. A number of large transactions, including Enbridge Inc's planned acquisition of Spectra Energy Corp for about $28 billion and a proposed merger between fertilizer producers Potash Corp of Saskatchewan Inc and Agrium Inc, drove deal activity to the second strongest year on record, after 2007.
title: Morgan Stanley, Barclays top Canadian M&A adviser rankings in 2016
